summary: Simple RaceMenu preset for a character (requested)
descriptionHtml:
[color=FF0000]Notice: This preset requires quite a few files and you need to know how to copy and paste :) It might [color=FF0000]seem a b[color=FF0000]it much for a preset but if you follow the instructions[/color][/color] correctly [color=FF0000]you should be fine. I use mod or[color=FF0000]ganiser so NMM you might have to[color=FF0000] do something a little [color=FF0000]different but the general idea is the same.[/color][/color][/color][/color][/color]

[center][u][size=5]Required Mods[/size][/u][/center]
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url]
[url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/seren4xx/15342092530]SRG Skin Textures[/url] (Note: This is a Flickr link as the author doesn't want a nexus upload)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion[/url] (You need a few files from this mod to mix with SRG, mainly specular and subsurface. Pick your choice for specular, I believe I used smooth)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72825/?]Maevan2's eye brows[/url] (I installed them as a replacer and have used the match hair colour option)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665/?]Better Makeup for SKSE [/url](Be sure to grab the SG Textures one, others might look a bit different)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70363/?]KS Hairdos - HDT Physics[/url] (If you intend to change the hair, this mod and the one above, HDT Physics Extensions, are not required)

[center][u][size=5]Recommended Mods[/size][/u][/center]
A body mod - I used [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNPB[/url] but [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]CBBE[/url] and others should be fine, not sure how it will look though.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8832/?]Realistic Eye Lighting[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67447/?]Improved Eye Reflections and Cube Map[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70451/?]Snapdragon Prime ENB[/url] (This is what I used for the screenshots so if you want it to look exactly like the shots, this is the enb I used. I used the Lost in Time and Snapdragon LUT preset that the ENB has)


[center][u][size=5]Installation Instructions[/size][/u][/center]

Make Sure that SKSE and RaceMenu are installed
Install this preset mod
SRG Textures (Watch video below for this part)
-Realistic Eye Lighting (optional)
The Eyes of Beauty
-Improved Eye Reflections and Cube Map (optional)
Maevan2's Eye Brows
Better Makeup for SKSE (Make sure it's the SG textures one or they won't match up properly)

SRG Textures installation video
author: Rentani
